import swap from"./swap";function BubbleSort(array){var animation=[];var len=array.length;var i,j;for(i=0;i<len;i++){for(j=0;j<len-i;j++){if(array[j]>array[j+1]){animation.push([j,j+1]);animation.push([j,j+1]);animation.push([j,array[j+1]]);animation.push([j+1,array[j]]);swap(array,j,j+1);}}}//console.log(animation);
return animation;}export default BubbleSort;
